thread.title: Lynne Born Joins Perelson Weiner LLP as CEO

author: cnbc.com
title: Lynne Born Joins Perelson Weiner LLP as CEO

organizations.name: lynne born joins perelson weiner llp

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Perelson Weiner, LLP ( www.pwcpa.com ) is pleased to announce Lynne Born has joined the boutique CPA firm as CEO. "This is a new position at Perelson Weiner," commented Ronald G. Weiner, president of the firm. Headquartered in New York City, Perelson Weiner has a national and international client base. “Lynne's expertise in professional service firm management as well in financial and high-net-worth services will help us grow qualitatively. Importantly, her approach is consistent with our client service driven firm’s values as we are committed to making a positive difference for our clients."
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180201006334/en/
Lynne Born, CEO, Perelson Weiner LLP (Photo: Business Wire)
As CEO, Ms. Born focuses on strategic planning and go-to-market initiatives in a variety of niche, industry and service areas that drive the firm's business objectives forward. She specializes in succession planning, growth and change management and the design of best in class Leadership and Development Programs for next generation career path. She has served as a leader in one of the largest multi-family offices in the country serving high-net-worth business owners and multi-generational families.
Ms. Born attended Northwestern University and participates in ongoing professional development including Harvard Business School's Leading Professional Services Firms; Strategic HR; Organizational Development; Executive Compensation; Business Development and Financial Management. She is a recipient of 2014's Woman of Influence Award, Silicon Valley and Women Who Make Their Mark Award.
Perelson Weiner LLP is a service driven, technically knowledgeable firm dedicated to helping high-net-worth individuals, their families and their businesses, both domestic and foreign. The firm’s team of seasoned and highly intelligent professionals is valued resources to assist clients make more money and keep it.
A recognized leader in the profession, Perelson Weiner is committed to client service and technical excellence. The firm has earned numerous awards including being named by INSIDE Public Accounting, one of the Fifty Best of the Best of firms in the United States for the third year in a row. In addition the firm was named as one of the five best firms in the Northeast. The Advisory Board also awarded Perelson Weiner the Inclusion and Diversity Award. The award was given in recognition of Perelson Weiner's appreciation and value of individual differences, encompassing an infinite range of individuals' unique characteristics and experiences.
